source_note: State baseline derived from Louisiana DEQ Solid Waste and Recycling Program; municipal participation varies widely.

organics.guidance: Yard waste recycling and composting encouraged under LDEQ guidelines.
organics.notes: Some parishes accept yard debris curbside.

paper_cardboard.guidance: Recycle clean paper and cardboard; flatten boxes.

glass_containers.guidance: Recycle bottles and jars at drop-off sites; limited curbside options.

plastics.guidance: Recycle bottles labeled #1â€“#2; check local rules for others.
plastics.notes: Plastic film and foam not accepted.

beverage_containers_crv.guidance: No beverage container deposit system in Louisiana.

household_batteries.guidance: Recycle rechargeable and lead-acid batteries through collection sites.

e_waste.guidance: Electronics accepted at parish collection centers and events.

plastic_bags_and_film.guidance: Plastic bags and film not accepted curbside.

bulky_items.guidance: Arrange bulky pickup through local sanitation department.
